content.question: Genetic engineering of agricultural crops has primarily increased the productivity of modern farming by

choices.label: converting annual plants to perennials, which do not require replanting
increasing the size of fruits and grains
increasing plants’ drought resistance and resistance to pests
cutting the cost of bulk seeds during planting seasons
changing vegetable and fruit colors to suit consumer demands

content.answer: increasing plants’ drought resistance and resistance to pests

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
